title: It's all been said before
text: Read the other 5-star reviews from recent months, I can't think of anything to add! I did not go to the evening receptions so I cannot comment on those, but all the positive comments about staff, room comfort and amenities, and breakfast buffet were confirmed during my two nights there.(One question, though -- considering all the food and beverage they give away each morning, why charge for the bottled water in the room? Is it that special??)
